name: Ortlieb Bikepacking Frame Pack
description:
This Frame Pack allows you to exploit the room in your bike frame to create valuable stowage. Thanks to its low centre of gravity under your top tube, it's great for heavy gear such as tools, camp stoves or food. The fabric and rolltop are waterproof and ideal for long tours and adventures where you know you'll ride through some nasty weather.Waterproof polyurethane-coated nylon ripstop fabric.IP64 waterproof rating is good for rainy weather.Adjustable hook-and-loop mounting straps.Rolltop closure.Highly reflective 3M scotchlite patches.Can be used on carbon bikes.

        Sustainability
